Package.Name: Bloggers
Package.InternalNotes:
These are from the base game. Copy from their folder in audioww to the root audioww to update

Packages are
\World_of_Tanks_NAes\packages\audioww-part1.pkg
\World_of_Tanks_NAes\packages\audioww-part2.pkg

Files to copy are the same as in the zips.

2021-12-05: Done in automation now, this is only an old url for a package version that isn't maintained:
https://wgmods.net/4234

Package.Description:
This allows anyone to use the bloggers´ voices for all of their commanders. 
(voices from contributor event 2020-01)

*Made by WG.

Package.Name: Company of Heroes [by {author}]
Package.InternalNotes: 2020-10-28: From Ekspoint there are no mods more\r\n\r\nRemoved Ekspoint_load.wotmod & LobbyApi.wotmod
Package.Author: Andre_V
Package.Description:
Siegfried by Strategic_Music+Andre_V_german
Note for youtube: Just wait ca. 20 seconds (russian language over)
Crew Sound Steel Foxes by Strategic Music and Andre_V
-provides alternative voice reactions from the tank crew. 
-More than 750 phrases for 45 different in-game situations.
-gives you a new gaming experience
-new emotions, atmosphere and some humor

The mod team:
Dmitry Kuzmenko – original idea, voice direction, script writing
Sergey Eybog - Technical director - Sergey Eybog
Erich Muff, Manuel Haefele - german Voice
Andrew Burmistrov, Savva Dudin, Stan Polesko, Ekaterina Kuzmenko - Sound editors
Olga Nigmatulina - Artist

Package.Author: AndreV
Package.Description:
Steel Foxes with Strategic Music & Andre_V
Note for youtube: Just wait ca. 20 seconds (russian language over)
-provides alternative voice reactions from the tank crew. 
-More than 750 phrases for 45 different in-game situations.
-gives you a new gaming experience
-new emotions, atmosphere and some humor

The mod team:
Dmitry Kuzmenko – original idea, voice direction, script writing
Will Bucknum – script writing, voice direction
Aaron Baca – script writing
Technical director – Serge Eybog
Sound design – Andrew Burmistrov, Stas Polesko, Petr Yakyamsev
Douglas Pullar – commander
John Bell – additional voice-over

Package.Name: Ed76na (RU) & SicFunzler (EU)
Package.InternalNotes:
2021-06-28: can use GO_engines.zip or SicFunzler_Engines.zip -> GO_engines.wotmod OR SicFunzler_Engines.wotmod

2020-10-23_WWise2019.2.3

Old gauss notes -------------------------------------------------------------------
Check CRCs from *.bnk NOT *.wotmod (CRC failed with wotmod)

GO_engines.wotmod OR SicFunzler_Engines.wotmod
unzip XYZ.wotmod IF vehicles_GO.bnk (audioww\vehicles_GO.bnk) is inside

Note: res_mods\audioww\*.bnk is working with Configs in mods\configs

Sound Event Injector : 
- great tool for modding sounds 
- no patches are needed 
- updating get much easier & faster

0. Soundinjektor is a great tool for modding sounds - no Patches are needed - updating gets much easier
1. Problem: Working alone as intended check replays
2. Problem: Soundinjektor is incompatible with WWIIHWA (WOT-Circle -- restart->crash->restart->crash....)
3. Dont have Ideas/ muse / moods for fixing now -123gauss

No PYmods_BanksLoader - only Patches to engine_config.xml

Usable with WWIIHWA (no Bankloader - Patches used)
- Sound Event Injector is compatible with WWIIHWA

Old Willster notes: -------------------------------------------------------------------
I dont know what we do with the Sound Event Injector Versions (script-file)
Bank-loader isnt used here & In Relhax - not necessary 
- take audio.xml/engine.config.xml

OLD NOTES: -------------------------------------------------------------------
Fedor Saveliev retired) too much work for this tricky mod,to rework
AGQJ: http://forum.worldoftanks.ru/index.php?/topic/1778752-
Package.Author: Ed76na (retired Apa6ecka) & SicFunzler
Package.Description: Authors: Ed76na (RU) [with retired Apa6ecka] & SicFunzler (EU) [since 2020]

Package.Name: Ed76na (RU) & SicFunzler (EU)
Package.InternalNotes:
2020-10-23_WWise2019.2.3

Too Update: 
Use SicFunzler-Sound\*.wotmod 
Check CRCs from *.bnk NOT *.wotmod (CRC failed with wotmod)
Use Ed76na: for tracer_GO.bnk
tracer_GO.bnk Does NOT Exist by SicFunzler
GO_engines.wotmod OR SicFunzler_Engines.wotmod OR DzD_Engines.wotmod
unzip XYZ.wotmod IF vehicles_GO.bnk (audioww\vehicles_GO.bnk) is inside

reload_GO.bnk	362.803 		23.10.2020 17:35	---- reload_GO.bnk 362.803 	23.10.2020 15:35 
tracer_GO.bnk	2.926.452	23.10.2020 17:33	---- Does NOT Exist

OLD NOTES:

Fedor Saveliev retired) too much work for this tricky mod,to rework
AGQJ: http://forum.worldoftanks.ru/index.php?/topic/1778752-

Dont use this version(PYmods_BanksLoader) with WWIIHWA: 
- Sound Event Injector is incompatible with WWIIHWA
- "WoT-Circle": Restart -> Crash -> Restart -> Crash....)
Sound Event Injector : 
- great tool for modding sounds 
- no patches are needed 
- updating get much easier & faster

0. Soundinjektor is a great tool for modding sounds - no Patches are needed - updating gets much easier
1. Problem: Working alone as intended check replays
2. Problem: Soundinjektor is incompatible with WWIIHWA (WOT-Circle -- restart->crash->restart->crash....)
3. Dont have Ideas/ muse / moods for fixing now -123gauss

Package.Name: War Guns (War Mod) v{version} [by {author}]
Package.InternalNotes: we can also get it from mediafire directly\r\nhttps://www.mediafire.com/file/fnx8xghaz59ovqg/War_Mod_Full_mod.rar/file
Package.Author: JohnTankPL
Package.Description:
Sounds for 
Guns, Hits, Tracer, Reloading, Surface Hits , Equipments

Notes:
- The mod is not finished yet, 
- There are no sounds for most tanks of the nation USSR and artillery in general
Package.UpdateComment:
Version 1.01-1.11.1.1B
- War Mod all sounds of falling shells can now be controlled with the Effects slider
- Fury Tank School USMC added some new sounds

- new sounds for completing campaign missions, tank repair, ricochet and penetration
- brand new sounds for binoculars and reticle.

- Fixes issue whereby the sound of the cartridge shell falling to the ground could be heard from allies in artillery.
- Changed the volume on falling shells, now adjustable in the audio options on the slider: Effects Volume.

- Gunshot sounds have been added for tanks: Pz.Sfl. IC, M4a1 fl 10, GSOR 1008

- New gunfire sounds for Soviet tanks: 
KV-2, T-150, KV-3, KV-4, STI, IS4, Object705, Object705A, BT-7, T-34, T-34-85, T-43, T-44, T-54, Object 140, T 62A, Object 430, Object 430U, A-43, A-44, IS-M, Object 416, Object 430 Version II, K-91, T 60,T 70, SU 76M, SU-85, SU-100, SU-152, ISU-152, Object 704, Object 268, SU-100M1, SU-101, Object 263, Object 268 Version 4, IS-6, IS-6B, Churchill III, KV-220-2 , KV-2 ®, Object 244, KV-85, KV-122, IS-2, IS-2M, IS-2 shielded, IS-3A, KV-4 Kreslavskiy, KV-5, IS-5, Object 252U Defender, Object 252U, Object 777 Version II, Object 260, Object 279 early, SU-76I, SU-85I, ISU-122S, SU-122-44, ISU-152K


Version 1.00-1.11.1
- New sound of falling shells : UDES 03, STRV 103, STRV 103B, STRV S1. 

- Gunshot sounds for tanks : M24E2 Super Chaffee, CS 52 Lis, Lansen C . 

- Brand new gunshot sounds for tanks : Pz.Kpfw. II J, Krupp-Steyr Waffenträger, Panther 8.8, E 50, E 50M, TVP 50/51

- Fixed an issue with the gunfire sound not working for allies and enemies on the gun 113 

- Gunshot sounds for Soviet tanks : NS-1, BT-2, BT-5, T 28, KV 1, KV 1 S, IS, IS 3, Object 257, IS-7, T 10, Object 277

Package.Name: Epic Mega Music Collection [by {author}]
Package.InternalNotes:
2021-05-08: The target file is "jk_EMMC_v1.12.1.x_vrb6.wotmod"

2020-03-12: No Patches needed: replaces WG original files (Willster419)
remove GUI-folder from the wotmod (also prevents bugs with DependencyGlobal_RelHax_LoadingSplash)
Package.Author: Andre_V / jakis_nick
Package.Description:
EMMC:Epic Mega Music Collection by jakis_nick 
+ made with new project 1.2 from WG: There is a music on every map
+ contains 559 (2019-12-10) tracks of trailer music, such bands as:
-Audiomachine, 
-Battle X Music, 
-Colossal Trailer Music, 
-Epic North, 
-Ninja Tracks.

The tracks were sorted so that they would not be repeated in different events.
Package.UpdateComment:
Updated: _1.7.0.0_2019-12-10.
 + added one new album with 19 tracks:
=> loginscreen - 10 tracks
=> hangar - 9 tracks
+ total tracks number (10.12.2019) is 559! 
"Brand X Music - Deconstruct (2019)"

Updated: 2019-10-01 v1.6.0.8 
+Changed playlist sorting 

Updated: 2019-08-23 v1.6.0.2: 
+ added one new album with 12 tracks:
=> battle - 6 tracks
=> loginscreen - 2 tracks
=> hangar - 4 tracks
+ total tracks number (23.08.2019) is 457! 
"Ninja Tracks - Resist 2.5 (2019)"
